question: The Bombay Presidency Association was founded in which of the following year?
explanation: The Bombay Presidency Association was founded by Pherozeshah Mehta, K.T. Telang, Badruddin Tyabji, and others. The Bombay Presidency Association was founded in the year 1885. The reactionary policies of Lytton and the Ilbert Bill controversy led to the formation of The Bombay Presidency Association.
